Name: Magician of Faith
Text: FLIP: Target 1 Spell in your GY (comma) add that target to your hand.

Name: Apprentice Magician
Text: If this card is Summoned: Target 1 face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on(comma) place 1 Spell Counter on that target. If this card is destroyed by battle: You can Special Summon 1 Level 2 or lower Spellcaster monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position.

Name: Magical Undertaker
Text: FLIP: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower Spellcaster monster in your GY(comma) Special Summon that target.

Name: Blade Knight
Text: Gains 400 ATK while you have 1 or less cards in your hand. If you control no other monsters(comma) the effects of Flip monsters destroyed by battle with this card are negated.

Name: Dweller in the Depths
Text: Gains 300 ATK for each Continuous Spell in your Spell & Trap Zone.

Name: Gilford the Lightning
Text: You can Tribute 3 monsters to Tribute Summon (but not Set) this card. If Summoned this way: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls.

Name: Sonic Bird
Text: When this card is Normal or Flip Summoned: You can add 1 Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand.

Name: Great Phantom Thief
Text: If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Declare 1 card name(comma) look at your opponent's hand(comma) and if you do(comma) discard all cards with that name in their hand.

Name: Djinn Disserere of Rituals
Text: When you Ritual Summon a monster(comma) you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon. The monster Ritual Summoned using this card is unaffected by Trap effects.

Name: Amazoness Trainee
Text: Monsters destroyed by battle with this card are returned to the bottom of the Deck instead of going to the GY. If this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: It gains 200 ATK.

Name: Zombina
Text: If this card in its owner's possession is destroyed by an opponent's card: You can target 1 Level 4 or lower monster in your GY(comma) except "Zombina"(comma) Special Summon it.

Name: Goblin Zombie
Text: If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Send the top card of their Deck to the GY. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: Add 1 Zombie monster with 1200 or less DEF from your Deck to your hand.

Name: The Legendary Fisherman
Text: While "Umi" is on the field(comma) this card is unaffected by Spell effects and cannot be targeted for attacks(comma) but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.

Name: Yomi Ship
Text: If this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the GY: Destroy the monster that destroyed this card.

Name: Levia-Dragon - Daedalus
Text: You can send 1 face-up "Umi" you control to the GY(comma) destroy all other cards on the field.

Name: Lost Blue Breaker
Text: If there is another face-up Fish(comma) Sea Serpent(comma) or Aqua monster on the field: You can Tribute this card(comma) then target 1 Spell/Trap on the field(comma) destroy that target.

Name: Fishborg Planter
Text: Once(comma) while this card is in the GY: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY(comma) then(comma) if it is a WATER monster(comma) Special Summon this card from the GY. You can only use this effect of "Fishborg Planter" once per turn.

Name: Imairuka
Text: If this card you control is destroyed by your opponent's card and sent to your GY: Send the top card of your Deck to the GY(comma) then(comma) if it is a WATER monster(comma) draw 1 card.

Name: Slushy
Text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Slushy" from your Deck to the GY. If you have 3 copies of "Slushy" total(comma) either banished and/or in your GY (combined): You can banish this card from your GY(comma) then target 1 Level 5 or higher Sea Serpent monster in your GY(comma) Special Summon that target. You can only use this effect of "Slushy" once per turn.

Name: Sinister Serpent
Text: During your Standby Phase(comma) if this card is in your GY: You can add it to your hand(comma) also banish 1 "Sinister Serpent" from your GY during your opponent's next End Phase. You can only use this effect of "Sinister Serpent" once per turn.

Name: Theban Nightmare
Text: Gains 1500 ATK while you have no cards in your hand nor in your Spell & Trap Zones.

Name: Infernity Beast
Text: If this card attacks while you have no cards in your hand(comma) your opponent cannot activate any Spell or Trap Cards until after the Damage Step.

Name: Ryu Senshi
Text: "Warrior Dai Grepher" + "Spirit Ryu" A Fusion Summon of this card can only be done with the above Fusion Materials. When a Normal Trap Card is activated (Quick Effect): You can pay 1000 LP(comma) negate that effect. This card must be face-up on the field to activate and to resolve this effect. Negate the effects of any Spell Card that targets this card and destroy it.

Name: Mystical Elf
Text: A delicate elf that lacks offense(comma) but has a terrific defense backed by mystical power.

Name: Axe Raider
Text: An axe-wielding monster of tremendous strength and agility.

Name: Great White
Text: A giant white shark with razor-sharp teeth.

Name: High Tide Gyojin
Text: A very agile half-fish warrior known for its relentless attacks.

Name: Warrior Dai Grepher
Text: The warrior who can manipulate dragons. Nobody knows his mysterious past.

Name: Sonic Duck
Text: A duck which can walk at a sonic speed. Sometimes(comma) he cannot deal with his incredible pace and loses control.

Name: Arcane Barrier
Text: Each time a face-up Spellcaster monster(s) on the field is destroyed(comma) place 1 Spell Counter on this card (max. 4). You can send this card and 1 face-up Spellcaster monster you control to the GY(comma) draw 1 card for each Spell Counter that was on this card.

Name: Fusion Recovery
Text: Target 1 "Polymerization" in your GY(comma) and 1 monster in your GY that was used as material for a Fusion Summon(comma) add them to your hand.

Name: Fulfillment of the Contract
Text: Activate this card by paying 800 LP(comma) then target 1 Ritual Monster in your GY(comma) Special Summon it and equip it with this card. When this card is destroyed(comma) banish the equipped monster.

Name: Sword of Dark Destruction
Text: Equip only to a DARK monster. It gains 400 ATK and loses 200 DEF.

Name: Pyramid of Wonders
Text: All Zombie monsters you control gain 200 ATK for each monster your opponent controls. If exactly 1 Zombie monster you control (and no other cards) would be destroyed(comma) you can send this card to the GY instead.

Name: Power of Kaishin
Text: Equip only to an Aqua monster. It gains 300 ATK/DEF.

Name: Umi
Text: All Fish(comma) Sea Serpent(comma) Thunder(comma) and Aqua monsters on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF(comma) also all Machine and Pyro monsters on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

Name: Big Wave Small Wave
Text: Destroy all face-up WATER monsters you control(comma) then you can Special Summon WATER monsters from your hand(comma) up to the number of monsters destroyed by this effect.

Name: Water Hazard
Text: Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower WATER monster from your hand. You must control no monsters to activate and to resolve this effect.

Name: Moray of Greed
Text: Shuffle 2 WATER monsters from your hand into the Deck(comma) then draw 3 cards.

Name: Warrior Elimination
Text: Destroy all Warrior monsters on the field.

Name: Mask of the Accursed
Text: The equipped monster cannot attack. Once per turn(comma) during your Standby Phase: Inflict 500 damage to the controller of the equipped monster.

Name: Robbin' Zombie
Text: If your monster inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Send the top card of their Deck to the GY.

Name: Dust Tornado
Text: Target 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls(comma) destroy that target(comma) then you can Set 1 Spell/Trap from your hand.

Name: Ready for Intercepting
Text: Target 1 Warrior or Spellcaster monster on the field(comma) change that target to face-down Defense Position.

Name: The Forceful Checkpoint
Text: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Look at your opponent's hand(comma) and if there is a Monster Card(comma) negate the attack(comma) then discard 1 monster from their hand (your choice).
